item.title: Temporal Evolution of Dark Energy
item.description: Throughout my senior year at UT, I’ve been taking astronomogy and cosmology courses out of personal interest. As you may know, dark energy is supposedly responsible for the accelerated expansion of the universe. In this blog post, I will discuss my team’s research on the temporal evolution of dark energy through analysis of the DESI (Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument) and DES (Dark Energy Survey) datasets. Our code can be found here.
